title: Phase transition properties: Normal melting temperature

ref.full: Couadou, E.; Jacquemin, J.; Galiano, H.; Hardacre, C.; Anouti, M. (2013) J. Phys. Chem. B 117, 1389-1402.
ref.title: A Comparative Study on the Thermophysical Properties for Two Bis[(trifluoromethyl)sulfonyl]imide-Based Ionic Liquids Containing the Trimethyl-Sulfonium or the Trimethyl-Ammonium Cation in Molecular Solvents
